channel.title: Shell on Taleeb Midi
channel.description: Recent content in Shell on Taleeb Midi

item.title: Change Directory Up Faster With Back up Command
item.description: Donovan Brown wrote a good article showcasing how you can use a custom PowerShell function to navigate up directories without the need to type multiple cd .. . I find his idea interesting and could be of important time saver if you spend a lot of time working with PowerShell. Unfortunately (or fortunately depends how you see it) nowadays I don't use PowerShell a lot, and when I do my usage is limited to few PowerCLI commands, but I do spend a considerable time interacting with Linux Shell, so the natural thing to do is to port Donovan's idea into a Bash script.
